it.polimi.ingsw.utils

Interface Observer<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the received events.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientManager, Controller, GameManager

    public interface Observer<T>
    Implements different methods to manage an observed event depicted by a message received from the an observable class. The basis of the observer pattern together with the Observable class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void update(T message)
      Does something when notified by an observable class.
      void update(T message, int id)
      Does something when notified by an observable class.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(T message)
        Does something when notified by an observable class.
        Parameters:
        message - the message depicting the event.

      • update

        void update(T message,
            int id)
        Does something when notified by an observable class.
        Parameters:
        message - the message depicting the event.
        id - the id of the player associated with the event.
